newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Aug 1st 20 days trade surplus down 81.1 pct.
newsitem.headline: Japan Aug 1st 20 days trade surplus down 81.1 pct.

text.p: Japan's customs-cleared trade surplus fell 81.1 percent to 69.09 billion yen in the first 20 days of August compared with a revised surplus of 365.15 billion yen in the same period a year earlier, the Finance Ministry announced on Thursday.
The figure compared with a trade surplus of 213.01 billion yen in the first 20 days of July.
Free on board (FOB) exports rose 5.9 percent to 2.03 trillion yen from a year earlier, while cost, insurance and freight (CIF) imports rose 26.4 percent to 1.97 trillion yen.
